changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.subtitle: change or reset your account password
changePassword.resetDescription: You will receive an email that contains every information that you need to do in order to create a new password.

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.subtitle: manage your account existence
verificationDescription: Request a new verification to be able to use the site properly,
if you have changed your email address recently or missed your previous verification email.
dangerZone.deleteConfirmationDescription: Your profile and all of your data will be removed. After this you cannot login into the application.
deleteDescription: Remove every data that is stored about you or your activity on this site,
and permanently delete your sign in credentials as well.

personalInformation.title: Personal Information
personalInformation.subtitle: update your personal informaiton
personalInformation.deleteDescription: Your photo will be completely removed from everywhere and will be replaced with the default avatar.

deleteDescription: {{name}} $t(page.collections.item.type.{{type}}) will be removed from {{group}} collection group.
The remove will be permanently and your profile will be updated.

groups.title: Edit Collection Groups
addDescription: The new group will be available in your collection and you will be able to add new items to it.
Simply give it a name as you wish and pick a color that helps you to identify the group.
groups.label: Group name

search.title: Search
search.emptyResult: There is no result for the given search query.
